statements: UPDATE glacier_movement SET movement_type='Retreating', movement_distance=10.5 WHERE glacier_id=1;
UPDATE glacier_movement SET movement_distance=5.3, location='Alaska' WHERE glacier_name='Matanuska';
UPDATE glacier_movement SET movement_type = 'advance', movement_distance = 20.5 WHERE glacier_name = 'Glacier A' AND location = 'Alaska';
UPDATE glacier_movement SET movement_type = 'retreat', movement_distance = 15.75, movement_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE glacier_id = 3;
UPDATE glaciers SET area_sq_km = 150 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE glacier_movements SET movement_direction = 'Retreating' WHERE glacier_id = 2;
UPDATE glaciers SET area_sq_km = 1000.50, name = 'Glacier A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE glacier_movements SET movement_direction = 'North', timestamp = '2023-07-15 10:30:00' WHERE glacier_id = 2;
UPDATE glaciers SET glacial_area = 5400 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_images SET captured_by_sensor = 'ABC-123' WHERE image_id = 5;
UPDATE glaciers SET location = 'Alaska', glacial_area = 15000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_images SET image_path = '/images/image1.jpg', captured_by_sensor = 'SatelliteA' WHERE image_id = 5;
UPDATE GlacierImages SET image_url='new_url_1' WHERE image_id=10;
UPDATE GlacierLocations SET region='new_region' WHERE location_id=5;
UPDATE GlacierImages SET image_url = 'new_image_url', capture_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE GlacierMovement SET movement_distance = 25.6, movement_date = '2024-02-20' WHERE movement_id = 3;
UPDATE glacier_locations SET location_name = 'Alaska Glacier' WHERE glacier_id = 1;
UPDATE glacier_images SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE glacier_id = 2;
UPDATE glacier_locations SET location_name = 'Mount Everest', latitude = 27.9881, longitude = 86.9250 WHERE glacier_id = 1;
UPDATE glacier_statistics SET stat_type = 'Snow Thickness', stat_value = 3.5 WHERE stat_id = 10;
